item.title: Roll Own VPN AdBlock Service
item.description: It’s actually super cheap & easy. The setup below costs a few dollars a year and uses ~20MB RAM total: Get a VPN Provider Install OpenVPN & setup client certs with https://github.com/Nyr/openvpn-install Setup your hosts file with http://winhelp2002.mvps.org/hosts.txt

item.title: Gateway VPN - Raspberry Pi Router
item.description: # nano /etc/sysctl.conf # net.ipv4.ip_forward=1 # sysctl -p # iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE # iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o tap0 -j MASQUERADE Enable VPN at boot # systemctl enable openvpn@Japan nano /etc/default/openvpn #AUTOSTART="Japan" ################################################## cron: @reboot sh /etc/openvpn/startRouting.sh cat /etc/openvpn/startRouting.sh iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o tap0 -j MASQUERADE cron: 0 0 * * * vnstati -i eth0 -o /var/www/bandwidth/current_s.
